DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the role of high dose therapy and autologous or allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplantation for the treatment of chronic lymphocytic leukemia.
DOC.brief_title: Transplantation for Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia
DOC.detailed_description: To determine effectiveness of allogeneic transplantation in eradicating chronic lymphocytic leukemia.
DOC.criteria: adequate organ function normal bone marrow cytogenetics active CNS disease For autologous patients more than 30% bone marrow involvement
